summary: Completed testing of skeleton loading animations on HomePage, ProfilePage, and MyPredictionsPage - all skeleton implementations working correctly with proper data-testids, CSS animations, and content fade-in effects

backend_issues.notes: All backend APIs working at 100% (17/17 tests passed). No backend changes in this iteration.

frontend_issues.notes: Skeleton loading animations work correctly but display briefly due to fast data loading (good UX). All required skeleton elements and animations implemented correctly.
